body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! This is Tyler Hill from Happy Paws Veterinary Clinic. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Julie! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the pricing for a surgery that my pet needs.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help with that. Could I first get the breed and age of your pet, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, he's a Beagle and he's three years old.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Julie. And for our records, could you confirm your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thanks! I'll look into the pricing for you now. One moment, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! After checking, I've found the pricing details for the surgery your pet needs. Shall I email the details to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, please, that would be great.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I've sent it to your email. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that’s everything. Thank you for your help, Tyler.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You’re very welcome, Julie! Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a lovely day!
